item.title: Nutek Cent Available
item.description: nutek-cent is here! # Based on reliable Centos Stream 9 Linux distribution, I prodly annonce the fresh member of Nutek 😺 family - nutek-cent. Get it from Docker Hub now, and start your hacking journey with the best of the best. Continue to image → Fully equiped, but slimmer than nutek-core, this image provides stability of Enterprise Linux in Docker container format. It contains security and hacking tools, as well as development packages making it very good companion, or too big (7 GB 🐢) to be true, throw away ad hoc container.
